overview: Exams are over and Casey is ready to let loose. She grabs Celeste, Georgia and Johnny for some high flying fun! Then Casey shows Johnny some fun on the ground. Not stopping there, Casey and Arianna grab the RV and head out to Malibu with Chris and Jarod. After a fun day on the beach, Arianna and Jarod opt for some roadside sex! To finish off her summer vacation Casey takes Rocco for some surf lessons which leads to Rocco giving some lessons of his own. So put down your books and get ready to go crazy with Casey Parker because School's Out!
title: Casey Parker's School's Out!
